meanings.definition: The sloping side of a hill.
meanings.sent1: The cows grazed peacefully on the hillside.
meanings.sent2: We hiked up the hillside to get a better view of the valley below.
meanings.sent3: The hillside seemed to be playing hide and seek with the sun, casting shadows all around.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the hillside turned into a canvas of orange and pink hues.
meanings.sent5: The hillside was alive with the sound of chirping birds and rustling leaves.

meanings.sent1: The hillside was covered in a blanket of wildflowers.
meanings.sent2: The children rolled down the hillside, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent3: The hillside looked like a giant green wave frozen in time.
meanings.sent4: The hillside stood tall and proud, overlooking the town below.
meanings.sent5: The hillside was a patchwork of different shades of green, like a quilt spread out on the land.
